content:
We have EPIC working fine with DSTU2 for a patient facing app.

We can connect to the EPIC sandbox with R4 but it gives us an error.

"Operation was unsuccessful because of a client error (Forbidden). Body has no content."

We are already adding the Authorization Bearer in the headers of the FhirClient. We couldn't find a fix for it and there is nothing on it when we Google. Any thoughts on what we are doing wrong here? Thanks.
In general, Epic support questions should be directed to http://fhir.epic.com or emailing open@epic.com
